summary: Fairy Tail's strongest team as your followers!
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD IS OUTDATED AND NO LONGER SUPPORTED. PLEASE USE THIS MOD INSTEAD:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60002/?

First Mod ever. This file contains the .esp files that will give you the ability to have Fairy Tail's strongest team as your followers!
Each follower levels with the player. Natsu may be a little overpowered...but hey when is he not?
Lucy's .esm can mess with uthgerd the unbroken.
The hairstyles used by Erza, Natsu, and Grey may be turned the same colors if the Player uses them. I'm not sure how to fix that.

Lucy Heartfilia- Her default outfit is Psijiic robes and she uses summoning powers to fight. She can be found in the Bannered Mare. May cause issues with Uthgerd the Unbroken...Working on that.

Gray Fullbuster- He uses Ice magic and can be found in The Drunken Huntsman

Natsu Doraguniru- He uses Flame magic and can be found in The Drunken Huntsman. Default outfit is Thalmor Robes- No hood.

Erza Scarlet- Fights using swords. Default armor is the Penitus Occulatus. Found in The Drunken Huntsman

Wendy Marvell- She doesn't fight (well...she uses her fists...) unless given a weapon. She uses Wards to defend herself and constantly emits an invisible spell that will not harm you but if you have the atronach stone ability she will constantly be buffing your magicka pool if you stand next to her. She will do the same to Natsu and Gray if they stand beside her. She can be found in The Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.

Extras Shown in Pictures:
Lucy/Wendy's Clothes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10626/?
Lucy's Whip: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46902/?
Natsu's Scarf: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16660/?

Requires:
Apachii Sky hairs- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168
Skyrim

HIGHLY Recommended:
CBBE Bodies - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Better Males- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?
Otherwise will be Vanilla body and face- according to downloaders that makes them really ugly. Please download these before commenting on the characters appearance -.-
Like Seriously without these Natsu and Gray look like Ichiya (but taller) and Erza, Lucy, and Wendy look old. I get it. There is a reason they are HIGHLY recommended.

My other Mods:
Random Laxus: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56918/?


Future Plans:
FairyTail Guild Tattoo
Fairytail Guild Mod
Pinker Hair for Natsu
Custom Armor for Characters
Special Spirit Summons for Lucy
HAPPY!!!! -"AYE SIIIIR!"-
author: Daeneyr1
